code: const initialState={documents:[],loading:false,error:null};export const documentReducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'FETCH_DOCUMENTS_REQUEST':return{...state,loading:true,error:null};case'FETCH_DOCUMENTS_SUCCESS':return{...state,documents:action.payload,loading:false};case'FETCH_DOCUMENTS_FAILURE':return{...state,loading:false,error:action.payload};case'UPLOAD_DOCUMENT_REQUEST':return{...state,loading:true,error:null};case'UPLOAD_DOCUMENT_SUCCESS':return{...state,documents:[...state.documents,action.payload],loading:false};case'UPLOAD_DOCUMENT_FAILURE':return{...state,loading:false,error:action.payload};default:return state;}};export default documentReducer;
